solution_line_template: He only has {initial_gold_bars} - {lost_gold_bars} = <<{initial_gold_bars}-{lost_gold_bars}={remaining_gold_bars}>>{remaining_gold_bars} gold bars after losing {lost_gold_bars} of them.
He then gives each of his friends {remaining_gold_bars} / {num_friends} = <<{remaining_gold_bars}/{num_friends}={gold_bars_per_friend}>>{gold_bars_per_friend} gold bars.
